name: Baron Aldus
description: Skill: Add a 2/2 Knight to your hand.

emotes.SORRY: I shouldn't have done that to you.
emotes.OOPS: How could I have not seen this?
emotes.CONCEDE: I need a tactical retreat. But I'll be back...
emotes.ERROR_TOO_MANY_MINIONS: My army is already too strong.
emotes.ERROR_GENERIC: I can't do that. Not yet.
emotes.ERROR_HAND_TOO_FULL: My armies and handies are too full!
emotes.ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_MANA: I can't pay for that one.
emotes.ERROR_CANT_TARGET_STEALTHED_MINIONS: That one is invisible. My army can't rid it.
emotes.ERROR_NOT_A_VALID_TARGET: My forces can't hit that one.
emotes.ERROR_MUST_ATTACK_A_TAUNT_MINION: We have to break through their defenses.
emotes.DEATH: You may have won the battle, but not the war.
